subject: math
title: Grade 3 Mathematics
description: Intermediate math skills for third grade students

multiplication.title: Multiplication
multiplication.description: Learn to multiply numbers and understand multiplication concepts

basic_multiplication.title: Basic Multiplication
basic_multiplication.learning_objective: Students will be able to multiply single-digit numbers

multiplication_word_problems.title: Multiplication Word Problems
multiplication_word_problems.learning_objective: Students will solve multiplication word problems

division.title: Division
division.description: Learn to divide numbers and understand division concepts

basic_division.title: Basic Division
basic_division.learning_objective: Students will be able to divide numbers with no remainders

division_with_remainders.title: Division with Remainders
division_with_remainders.learning_objective: Students will understand and calculate remainders

fractions.title: Fractions
fractions.description: Introduction to fractions and parts of a whole

understanding_fractions.title: Understanding Fractions
understanding_fractions.learning_objective: Students will understand fractions as parts of a whole

measurement.title: Measurement
measurement.description: Learn about measuring length, weight, and volume

measuring_length.title: Measuring Length
measuring_length.learning_objective: Students will measure objects using standard units

measuring_weight.title: Measuring Weight
measuring_weight.description: Compare and measure weight of objects
measuring_weight.learning_objective: Students will understand weight and use scales

3d_shapes.title: 3D Shapes
3d_shapes.description: Learn about cubes, spheres, and cylinders
3d_shapes.learning_objective: Students will identify and describe 3D shapes

perimeter.title: Perimeter
perimeter.description: Calculate the perimeter of simple shapes
perimeter.learning_objective: Students will calculate perimeter of rectangles
